attributes.additional_details: Help parents, increases attendance and makes summer holidays more affordable for childcare.
attributes.background: Cut school holidays to 5 weeks and give parents the option to take there child out any 1 week of the year at any time. Makes holidays more affordable cuts down on fines and increases attendance

rejection.details:
The dates of school holidays are a matter for individual schools, but we have published the following petitions, which you might like to sign:

Allow school children 5 days of absence: for family, holidays & mental wellbeing: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/632846

Scrap fines for taking children out of school in term time: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/631546
